title: FS or trade: Cravath PSA for Collins and Cravath SGC
author: silvor

posts.post_title: FS or trade: Cravath PSA for Collins and Cravath SGC
posts.post_content:
I have the following:

Cravath PSA 4 $108

I would like to get a Cravath in SGC 50/4 or better and/or a Jimmy Collins in at least a SGC 40/3 or better.  I can add cash.

If you are interested I can send scans.
